fields.name: FaultText
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong :(


Please review the below text, it may explain the problem in a way you can fix by pressing "Previous" and changing your entered data. Otherwise, please screenshot this error, and send it to IT Support.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum length is 40 characters.
Maximum length is 80 characters.
Birthdate cannot be in the future or before 1/1/1900.
Maximum 40 Characters.
Email needs to be in the format "example@example.com"
Address must contain at least the City, State and Postal Code.

fields.name: QLDYouthCaseText
fields.fieldText:
Unable to Submit Referral


Due to one of the following reasons you referral cannot be submitted:

  • You are outside our geographical area of Grafton to Tweed Heads
  • You are under the age of 16

Please contact Social Futures on 1800 719 625 to see if there is a service that could help assist you.

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot contain more than 50 characters.
Email needs to be in the format "example@example.com"
Maximum 15 Characters.

fields.name: Can_be_contacted_in_relation_to_referral

Thank you for completing the online form, your details have been recorded and successfully submitted

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Worker_Name}, 

  

Thank you for submitting your referral form. We will be reviewing your information shortly. 

 

A member of our team will be in touch with the referred person soon to follow up and discuss the next steps. 

  

In the meantime, please find a copy of your submitted referral attached as a PDF for your records. 

  

If you have any immediate questions, feel free to reach out to us at 1800 719 625. 

  

We look forward to connecting with you. 

  

Best regards, 

Social Futures
